title: Someone tried to steal my account
body: His name is (removed) and is linking me to this website which is a website that steals peoples accounts. obviously i didnt fall for it but can there be some repercussions for him please

replies.body:
Hi grey fullebuster ,

Thanks for bringing this to everyone's attention, but **could you please remove the link** so nobody accidentally clicks it? Maybe just identify it as {logintocontunie}.

You are also going to have to **remove the guys name** as it is against boards policy to name and shame. Just send it along to riot in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) with all the info so they can get right onto it.

Make sure that if you see the link commented anywhere on the boards/news items to report it ASAP using the report feature in the bottom right corner. ♥

Hey there grey,

I might almost recommend (as well as reporting this person) to change your account passwords - including your email address and Boards account. This suggestion might seem a bit obvious but it's one of the simpler ways to protect your account quickly! 

I hope you get this sorted out. Let us know how you go. :)
